channel.title: Make my self an npc on login
channel.description:
Is there anyway i could make myself an npc, w/o doing pnpc command? Like im always it, right when i log in? Ex. I want o be a shade on login ID:425
Thanks!

Thank you, i figured it out!

item.title: Make my self an npc on login
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

sM(“Welcome To JustPKZ!”); // my welcome message, find yours
checkDupe();
firstlogin = 10;
server.special.loginSpec(this, playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);
if(isInPitGame() && !inPitsGame){
toX = 2399;
toY = 5171; // Your server should have stuff looking like this, put the next bit what ever it is
if(playerRights >= 3) {
npcId = npc;
npcId2 = npc;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

//make sure to add bracket at the end.

Read full topic
